extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A grade of B- in DRAM251.
Corequisite    DRAM200.

basic.description: Continuation of DRAM 251/3.0. Writing of dramatic exercises and one-act plays accompanied by dramaturgical study of published and original works, including final submissions for DRAM 251/3.0.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Playwriting and Dramaturgy II
